description: Ancient NumbersWelcome to the Ancient Numbers Page. It is a work in progress, and many features will be added in the coming weeks and months.Aim: To help my students and the general public better understand ancient Greek and Roman numbers, and how they were represented. Different subpages will provide explanations, calculators, and graded quizzes.
